content: **elephant amigurumi crochet pattern** this pattern is available for free on my blog - www loopsandlovecrochet com here you are paying to purchase an ad-free printable version of this crochet pattern this elephant amigurumi is the perfect size for playing with and cuddling for an extra soft and cuddly elephant you can use a worsted-weight velvet/chenille type yarn for this project but it also works up wonderfully in a regular worsted weight yarn too the pdf pattern includes written instructions for making the elephant amigurumi this pattern is intermediate-beginner friendly but it is also a fun pattern for more experienced crocheters your finished elephant amigurumi will measure approx 12 inches tall materials needed - worsted weight yarn #4 weight - you can use any worsted-weight yarn for this project you will need approximately 200yd/182m in a main color and 20yd/18m in an accent color - 4mm crochet hook or 3 5mm - or your preferred hook size for amigurumi - 12mm safety eyes - fiber stuffing - yarn needle to weave in ends **you may make and sell any items made from this pattern but please link back to this pattern or loops & love crochet please do not share reproduce or copy this pattern for any purpose please do not re-publish photos as your own thank you for respecting my rights as the designer and for supporting loops & love crochet thank you and happy crocheting loops & love crochet
